summary: When her mother died, 10 year old girl Misa's world stopped. And when her father, along with her new girlfriend, wants to spend the summer in the Swedish province Skåne she refuses to come ... See full summary »
cast: Kim Jansson|Lena Granhagen|Per Nilja|Magnus Krepper|Sverre Porsanger|Sara Margrethe Oskal|Anna Maria Blind|Tomas Kärrstedt|Sannamari Patjas|Henrik Gustavsson|Pierre Lindstedt|Michael Odhag|Hackim Jakobsson|Anton Raukola|Ingemar Raukola|Jessica Forsberg|Rolf Sundberg
title: Misa mi
